text: Windom's Way is a 1957 British thriller movie directed by Ronald Neame and based on the 1952 novel of the same name by James Ramsey Ullman. It stars Peter Finch, Mary Ure, Natasha Parry, Robert Flemyng, Michael Hordern, Olaf Pooley, Burt Kwouk and was distributed by Rank Organisation. ==Other websites== * Category:1957 thriller movies Category:British thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Ronald Neame
title: Windom's Way
